channel.title: pariyatti on American Monk: Life with Buddha, Dhamma and Saṅgha
channel.description: Recent content in pariyatti on American Monk: Life with Buddha, Dhamma and Saṅgha

item.title: I Finally Did It!
item.description: I Finally Did It! This Rainy Season (Vassa) I was able to learn the Pātimokkha (227 Rules) by heart. It is the first round and it takes me a long time to do it, and there are mistakes. Never the less, it is considered “learned” and “memorized” at this stage. I will hopefully recite the Pātimokkha for the full moon November 3rd if all goes well. I need to get my 2+ hours of recitation down to at least 1:15 minutes.
